message:
#Paypal #Question
I wanna accept online payments in USD through PayPal Payments Standard, I have paypal account but connect to an Egyptian credite card and verified, n have another USD account in HSBC, How does it work? should i connect my paypal account with USD bank account to be able to withdraw dollars, or how i even withdraw recieved money from paypal? 
I hope i don't sound dumb* :D

data.message: It wont , the central bank allows withdraw from paypal to credit card cant withdraw to debit

I wrote several complains to PayPal and they mentioned that the CBE forbid transfers from PayPal to your accounts in USD. It must be in EGP. And it's only added to your credit cards not your debit cards. If you attemp to withdraw it in cash you will be charged with a percentage even if your credit is covering your credit limit.
HSBC solve that by calling the customer support asking them to make transfer from your credit card to your bank account or to your debit card to withdraw the money cause it cannot be done from the internet banking
Short confirmed answer: You can't withdraw in USD from Egyptian PayPal accounts.

Can i keep the dollars in my paypal account and withdraw it anyother way like western union or something? 
Or even can i keep the dollars in my account n use it to buy for services that needs dollars?
We do this as a service in Profolio, contact me for more details
I confirm Ahmed Melege's answer. I personally called them for the same purpose and that's what they said. However, you can call PayPal support and ask, and they're just amazing and very responsive.
